General.Name: Fujian Yuanli Active Carbon Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Yuanli Active Carbon Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells activated carbon in China. It offers powdered activated, extruded activated, granular activated, honeycomb activated, and supercapacitor activated carbon products, as well as civil carbon bags; and sodium silicate products. The company serves in food, pharmaceuticals, waste treatment, water purification, flue gas treatment, chemical and mining, oil and gas recovery, solvent recovery, air purification, catalytic, and gas refine and storage industries. It also exports its products to Asia, Europe, the United States, and other countries and regions. Fujian Yuanli Active Carbon Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Nanping, China.
